column1: It is a proud moment for me to speak tomorrow at the U.S. Navy event where Petty Officer Doris Miller will be acknowledged for his bravery and have an aircraft carrier named after him. https://t.co/5dPa3fq8ET

This is my 6th year working the assembly line for the annual Socks for Veterans event. I have a deep appreciation for our Veterans. I am grateful for their sacrifice and dedication to this country. https://t.co/9Z5HNvWee3
I want to wish my friend former First Lady @MichelleObama a very HAPPY BIRTHDAY! From my family to yours - enjoy your special day. https://t.co/d7aKk1s2Jy

Reducing our carbon footprint will take a concerted effort & a collaborative & principled approach grounded in science. Thanks to @Microsoft for your leadership. We look forward to making this inclusive and bringing others along. #sustainability https://t.co/aMJLpnoBjN

Thank you @AstroAnnimal and @AstroHague for sharing your incredible spaceflight experiences with me today and for all you are doing for our nation. Your accomplishments are an inspiration for our youth and the next generation of the STEM workforce. https://t.co/suX6LeHmBV
Today I give respect to two men who worked tirelessly to help better our nation - Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. and Congressman John Conyers Jr. https://t.co/vBA6Qc8fTq
Homeless assistance programs in Dallas to receive $16.7 Million in HUD funding - Please see my statement below: https://t.co/Gc7rrT6YAz
Happy Founders' Day Sorors!  We stand on 112 Years of Excellence today! It is a pleasure serving with you.   #AKA1908 #1908 https://t.co/EkGXL5zRZm
Today I stood on the House floor to ask Congress to continue to work together to lower the cost of prescription drugs for our constituents. See below:  https://t.co/pPuTByvIS8
Happy Korean American Day - we are stronger together! #KoreanAmericanDay

It was my pleasure to attend the ribbon cutting ceremony for the new South Oak Cliff High School today. These students are our future - they deserve the facilities necessary for success! https://t.co/0ZaZJiU4d5

Congratulations to the 300 scholars in #RegeneronSTS 2020 including Abhishek (Abhi) Joshi Lucy Kim Nikhil Vicas Arun Eswara Brandon Wang and Andrei Spiride from Texas! https://t.co/Bb3Nwe6Dbq @Regeneron @Society4Science
Please see my statement on U.S. Airstrike in Iraq Against High-Level Iranian Military Officials: https://t.co/itOAdXjudm

Shootings in places of worship are becoming too commonplace. People should not be afraid to gather and fellowship. I thank the parishioners who acted selflessly to save lives. Our hearts go out to the victims' families and members of the West Freeway Church of Christ.

Happy Birthday Texas! December 29 1845 Texas was the 28th state admitted to the Union! Celebrate by exploring maps of the Lone Star State online at The Library of Congress.   #Texas #Maps #LibraryofCongress

I am proud to announce that the U.S. Department of Health & Human Services has awarded $1397132 to the Martin Luther King Jr. Family Clinic. This clinic provides vital health services and programs to thousands of Dallas-Ft. Worth families.
Bryan Adams High School Freshman Kaveion Morris deserves recognition for his bravery and courage that resulted in saving a girl from drowning earlier this month. https://t.co/MZh1z3VtWv

Constituents of Texas-30 The U.S. Census Bureau is hiring Census Takers to work in their own communities. You can make a difference help your community and earn extra income for doing it. Apply online at https://t.co/MT0Tc9g2RE.   #2020CensusJobs

Earlier today I voted to pass the #USMCA - a bipartisan trade deal negotiated with our neighbors Canada and Mexico. As a Senior Member of the Texas Delegation I recognize the importance of trade to our state's economy and the jobs it will bring to TX-30. https://t.co/6wZUbJIl22
Today I stood with @TheBlackCaucus and @HouseDemocrats outside of @USDA to protest against President Trump’s cuts to SNAP. https://t.co/qhexalxOSa
Please find my response in support of H.Res.755 - Impeaching Donald J. Trump President of the United States for High Crimes and Misdemeanors https://t.co/RdfSC2UOeY

As Congress returns this week to vote on Articles of Impeachment let's not forget the progress made on lowering prescription drug prices by passing H.R. 3 the Elijah E. Cummings Lower Drug Costs Now Act in the House last week. I urge the Senate to take up and pass this bill.
I support the Articles of Impeachment as written by the Judiciary Committee and plan to support both Articles next week on the House floor. https://t.co/DZYDiDi5bp
The #ParisAgreement was signed 4 years ago today. I’m standing with @CaucusOnClimate and @SEEC to let the world know that #WeAreStillIn https://t.co/o7U5PbHuyp

To the families of lost ones attending today’s committee hearing - public safety is the number one priority for @TransportDems. We're working to find where the design development and certification of the #Boeing737max went wrong to ensure these tragedies never happen again. https://t.co/8aSAkVwyy2
Today I voted yes on bipartisan #OceanClimateAction bills to protect Americans from sea level rise and chronic flooding.

My colleagues and I worked together with @USTradeRep to make the #USMCA a better trade deal. This revised agreement is a win for the U.S. economy and American families. It will also serve as the new standard for all future U.S. trade deals. https://t.co/SqlhIuCfEx

Our hearts go out to the families who lost loved ones in today’s senseless shooting at the Naval Air Station in Pensacola FL. We are praying for the safety of all officers and civilians stationed at military bases across the U.S. and salute the first responders on the scene.

By simply sitting down Rosa Parks inspired us to stand up for justice liberty and equal rights. The Rosa Parks – In Her Own Words exhibit at the Library of Congress is an educational and moving experience. #RosaParks https://t.co/jMgIGcMoy5

The USDA’s recent announcement of SNAP rollbacks prove counterproductive to our goal as Representatives of our communities; to ensure that the most vulnerable among us are able to put food on their tables. #HandsOffSNAP

On the International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women I am proud to join @JanSchakowsky @HouseDemWomen and over 100 colleagues in reintroducing the International Violence Against Women Act. It’s time to #EndViolence against women. #IVAWA #GenerationEquality

I’m LIVE now discussing issues impacting my constituents and their communities and answering questions! Dial 855-286-0280 or stream the event online here: https://t.co/cojfxgzhiD https://t.co/yvBuhyY2zg

Don’t forget to sign up for my live interactive telephone town hall tomorrow November 19th at 7:30 PM CT! I will be speaking directly with my constituents and answering YOUR questions! Register here to be called when the event begins: https://t.co/cojfxgzhiD https://t.co/D174iOeuHI

Heartbroken to learn of yet another tragic shooting in California this afternoon. Enough is enough - students should not fear for their lives while at school. Our thoughts and prayers MUST be supplemented by commonsense gun safety legislation.

Join me on Tuesday Nov. 19 at 7:30 PM CT for a live interactive telephone town hall. I want to speak with my constituents answer questions and discuss issues impacting Texas and the U.S. as a whole. Register here to be called at the time of the event: https://t.co/cojfxgzhiD https://t.co/6IuoxSv5pL

I invite members of the North Texas community to attend the Census 2020 Summit hosted by the City of Dallas. The summit will take place this Thursday November 7th at Crozier Hall/Old Dallas High School from 9:00 - 11:00 AM. RSVPs are requested for attendance. https://t.co/YSChQs2SAQ

Open Enrollment in Health Insurance Marketplace starts November 1.  Make sure you #GetCovered on https://t.co/xHOxNkoNur for 2020.  Please see the attachment below for North Texas Enrollment Locations: https://t.co/iSN5srUP9y

Each year in the United States over 252000 women are diagnosed with breast cancer. Early detection is key. Be sure to schedule an annual breast cancer screening. #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth https://t.co/LaqSyIJkwm

STEM educators and students in the 30th District - did you know that there are two exciting opportunities for you coming up?  Please see below for more information and remember that the deadline for submissions for both challenges is November 1st. https://t.co/pFG8FYD8gk

Great to meet @DrZvizdic to discuss U.S.-Bosnia relations and their ambitions to join the EU and NATO. As a Co-Chair of the Congressional Caucus on Bosnia the relationship between our two countries is vital to stability in the region. https://t.co/ah3XRLVBYd

I was profoundly saddened to learn of the passing of a great statesman and colleague Congressman Elijah Cummings this morning. His legacy will endure in this great institution as those that live in the hearts of others never truly perish. May he rest in peace.

The Congressional App Challenge is a competition aimed at encouraging middle and high school students to learn to code by creating their own applications. The deadline for submissions is November 1st. I invite students from District 30 to register here: https://t.co/zMXOlAvWlI
REMINDER: Applications for Military Service Academy nominations are due by COB on Friday October 18. You can find the application and additional information here --> https://t.co/ik2fG3U0EN
@JeffFortenberry I want to make sure you know what you’ll pay for a room up front the next time you plan a trip. Read more about the bill here: https://t.co/pzSgmVU1TR

@JeffFortenberry This bipartisan bill would require all hotels and places of short-term lodging to advertise a price that includes all mandatory fees. This applies to online travel agents and short-term rental sites as well. #EndHiddenFees

This deceptive practice is unfair to consumers and should have stopped a long time ago. Today we take a step forward towards ending these fees. I am proud to introduce the Hotel Advertising Transparency Act with my colleague @JeffFortenberry #EndHiddenFees

For over 20 years hotels and other short-term lodging operators have gotten away with advertising prices that don't include hidden fees such as resort fees cleaning fees or facility fees. This industry has brought in over $30 billion thanks to this practice. #EndHiddenFees
Read my statement on impeachment proceedings here: https://t.co/GOoSPADyq3 https://t.co/2qX3jYB26H
Native American women have to work an additional 9 months just to get paid the what their white male counterparts got paid last year. #NativeWomensEqualPay

Today the Congressional Homelessness Caucus hosted @naehomelessness to discuss their Demographic Data Project. It is critical that lawmakers such as @RepHastingsFL and I have the research to develop effective understanding and humane policies to address homelessness. https://t.co/ot5CN7hoEE

¡Feliz #HispanicHeritageMonth a todos celebrando en el distrito 30 en Tejas (TX-30) y en toda la nación!  Sus triunfos y riqueza cultural causan que nuestras comunidades sean mas vibrantes y prosperas. https://t.co/orzwE9RlzL

Happy #HispanicHeritageMonth to all who are celebrating in TX-30 and across the country! Your pride accomplishments and rich cultures make our communities more vibrant and prosperous. https://t.co/lQZaSNKTCb
I'm LIVE now discussing issues impacting my constituents and their communities and answering questions! Dial 855-286-0280 or stream the event online here: https://t.co/cojfxgzhiD

Honored to host a Congressional Homelessness Caucus briefing w my Co-Chair @RepHastingsFL @naehomelessness @NAMICommunicate & New Hope Housing Inc. on chronic homelessness and mental health. Texas has over 3000 individuals experiencing chronic homelessness on any given day. https://t.co/Lu7pQAngIh

Don't forget to sign up for my live interactive event on Tuesday Sept. 10 at 7:30 PM CT! I will be speaking directly with my constituents and answering YOUR questions. Register here to be called when the event begins: https://t.co/cojfxgzhiD https://t.co/KDh8wmLPOg

It is a privilege to represent TX-30 in Congress and I’d like to recognize your support and the solidarity of our community with a celebration. Therefore it is my pleasure to invite you to join me at my 27th Annual Community Appreciation Day on Oct. 5 at 10AM in Lancaster TX. https://t.co/VBSqmqcOih

Join me on Tuesday Sept. 10 at 7:30 PM CT for a live interactive event. I want to speak with my constituents answer questions and discuss issues impacting Texas and the U.S. as a whole. Register here to be called at the time of the event: https://t.co/cojfxgzhiD https://t.co/6xhKSIKKjF

Majority of Americans support #equalpay regardless of gender race ethnicity and socioeconomic level. Yet despite such great support for this issue pay disparities show that equal pay for equal work is far from a reality especially for Black women.

Today along with Reps. Stewart Moulton and Gianforte I introduced a bill to designate “9-8-8” as the universal number for the national suicide prevention and mental health crisis hotline. You can learn more about the bill here: https://t.co/VxLn7XQiHo

Strong democracies welcome those who criticize their policies. It is shameful that Mr. Netanyahu has chosen to ban two of my colleagues from visiting Israel and Palestine. The US has poured billions of taxpayer dollars into Israel. This action is an insult to the American people.

The Trump administration’s proposal to enable discrimination in the workplace against LGBTQ people women and other minorities in the name of religion would be a dangerous setback in our fight for equality and inclusion. https://t.co/tMQFywTwZJ
Social Security has been working for the people for 83 years. Let’s protect and expand it for the over 63000 beneficiaries in Dallas County. #SocSec84 https://t.co/q6pT5d0AEi
Peace and blessings to the North Texas Muslim community observing Eid al-Adha today.

Today on the 54th anniversary of the enactment of the Voting Rights Act of 1965 we celebrate our progress in the fight for equal access to the ballot – and are reminded of the work that remains ahead of us. https://t.co/zt41vj9FLQ

Thank you to all who contributed to the success of our Annual Youth Summit & Diversity Dialogue in Dallas today. Now more than ever it is crucial that we recognize the role diversity plays in strengthening our communities. https://t.co/w0Xc8eIC5Y

Devastated to hear of yet another tragic and senseless shooting in El Paso today. My thoughts and prayers are with the victims and their loved ones but our thoughts and prayers are no longer enough.  TX-30 stands in solidarity with the city of El Paso.
Happy 54th birthday to Medicare and Medicaid! Proud to continue my work with @HouseDemocrats to strengthen these essential programs for our seniors and families. https://t.co/jP5hs0bOFd

I voted for the bipartisan #StopBadRobocalls Act on the House floor today because it’s time to end the robocall epidemic once and for all. Texans are sick and tired of answering spam calls and Congress has now taken action to protect consumers from these scammers. https://t.co/g4DPJtbjJa

The president’s tweets are a sad reminder of the divisive rhetoric that exists at the highest levels of our government. I am proud to serve alongside my colleagues in the most diverse Congress in the history of our country as we continue the fight for equality and inclusion.

I am proud to invite high school students from the Dallas area to apply for my Annual Youth Summit & Diversity Dialogue on August 5 2019. Learn more about the event at the link below:  https://t.co/7bFpb6vzFO

The crowning achievement of the civil rights movement – the Civil Rights Act – was signed into law by LBJ in 1964. Today on its 55th anniversary we are reminded of the work ahead to ensure equal rights and access for all Americans. https://t.co/RjHBdkP7Oa

Yesterday I voted in favor of H.R. 3401 a bill to address the humanitarian crisis at our southern border. The House has now taken concrete action to ensure that families have access to basic necessities. Citizen or not they are human beings and deserve our support.
The Trump Administration has chosen yet again not to act on climate — inaction that comes at the expense of protecting the health and safety of the American people. https://t.co/vAyTyWXmct

More people should know the name and achievements of Sally Ride. As the first American woman in space she helped blaze a trail for young women and girls to follow. Our nation is grateful for her passion for science and space exploration. https://t.co/nSxLUEZeEr
Delighted to offer my congratulations to our new Mayor Eric Johnson! I'm looking forward to the work we will do together for people of Dallas.

Last month we celebrated the historic bipartisan passage of the Equality Act. This #PrideMonth we’ll keep pushing equality forward. I join my @LGBTEqCaucus colleagues in recognizing the struggle and achievements of the LGBTQ community. Happy #Pride2019! https://t.co/OiJ54qNuDL

Being part of #TeamTexas means pushing for more business and investments so we make our economy even stronger. I was delighted to be part of The SelectUSA Investment Summit hosted by the Department of Commerce yesterday. https://t.co/cgCBkQJNIA
In honor of the women who have worn the uniform of the U.S. military we take this day to recognize Women Veterans for their service and sacrifice.   #WomenVeteransDay

From increased funds for medical research to early childhood education to worker protection the Labor-HHS-Education @AppropsDems bill makes the investments needed to give every person a better chance at a better life. https://t.co/uTMqxiBUjZ

Dr. Rubin has a well-deserved place in history. As a tribute to the woman whose pioneering work made this pursuit possible I proudly introduced this bill to ensure that the Large Synoptic Survey Telescope bears her name. https://t.co/qrCFeZb0Pv

Children do not belong in military prisons and I’m proud to cosponsor a bill that ensures our nation plays no part in the horrific practice. Thank you @BettyMcCollum04 for your leadership on this legislation. https://t.co/jKYnCOipL2
Moms overall who work full-time year-round are only paid 69¢ for every $1 paid to dads. But for moms of color the gap is even worse. Today is #MomsEqualPayDay and I’m speaking up for change!

Less than a week after 12 lives were lost due to senseless gun violence we observe #NationalGunViolenceAwarenessDay. More than 100 days have passed since the House voted to end this epidemic. It is past time for the Senate to join us in our effort to #EndGunViolence.

As the daughter of a veteran of World War II I have a sacred understanding of the great sacrifice paid by those who led the allies to triumph on D-Day. On this day let us honor those who died in defense of our way of life by cherishing the freedom they helped secure for us. https://t.co/jvXhSZCTtI

It’s taken much longer than it should have but I’m relieved that we finally passed this major disaster aid bill. For families all across the country including our neighbors here in Texas this support was much overdue.  https://t.co/6rjDcacJtQ
To all of our Muslim friends and neighbors #EidMubarak! We are delighted to send our most sincere wishes as you celebrate your faith with your families today! https://t.co/zbGvzgb7lT
https://t.co/gkSarzSG3s
On this #MemorialDay we express our deepest gratitude to the fallen servicemen and servicewoman we remember everyday and honor especially today. https://t.co/x74un4FtVO
https://t.co/PuNP4QNKhF

Today I stood alongside fellow women in the Capitol to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the House passing the 19th Amendment which gave women the right to vote. We must build on its legacy by ensuring women everywhere have the ability to achieve their full potential. https://t.co/L6mpWCEoAP

Thanks to all of the speakers and hosts at Cedar Valley Community College who made this year’s Youth Crime Prevention Summit a success. I hope the students enjoyed their time and learned more about planning a positive future. https://t.co/eFlxYQouup

We really can make investments that are both good for the environment and for the economy.  We can support innovation in the solar and wind industries ensuring that these important energy resources can play an even larger role in our clean energy future. https://t.co/rDcCujaGvn
These are the values Imam Suleiman stands for and why I invited him to offer a prayer in the House chamber.
Imam Suleiman has stood hand in hand with leaders of both parties in denouncing hate bigotry and violence. https://t.co/oxYJTuVEqK

After last year’s terrible tragedy at the Tree of Life Synagogue he led his Muslim congregation to spread messages of love for the Jewish community.  The message: “You are family.”  https://t.co/AlRzQUFAuI
In his prayer yesterday Imam @omarsuleiman504 as he has time and again used his voice to call for peace & justice — especially in times of struggle.

Over 130 MILLION Americans -- including over 11.5 MILLION Texans -- with pre-existing conditions are protected under the ACA. The Trump Administration wants to take away those vital protections. HR 986 protects their coverage. #ProtectOurCare https://t.co/70FocqbxIF

Thanks to everyone who attended my 27th Military Service Academy this weekend at DeSoto High School. Our Service Academies offer a world-class education and it was wonderful to meet so many #TX30 students interested in attending one! https://t.co/10QMubgDtA

As Ramadan begins for Muslims across the country I'm delighted to wish everyone observing this holy month #RamadanMubarak and recognize this important month in Congress. May this Ramadan bring peace purity and prosperity for all.  https://t.co/nTkXeeOZ2Q
Join us at the DeSoto HS Collegiate Cafeteria for Service Academy Day beginning at 10 a.m. Enter around back of the school past the gym! https://t.co/UUg5CAzdk7

Marking #HolocaustRemembrance Day just days after a synagogue shooting makes it painfully clear that violent anti-Semitism did not end with the defeat of the Nazis. #NeverAgain is a challenge to us all never to remain silent in the face of anti-Semitism and bigotry. #WeRemember

Join us this Saturday at the DeSoto High School Collegiate Cafeteria for Military Service Academy Day 2019! Learn about the incredible benefits of the free education and life-long connections academy graduates gain by attending.   Hope to see you there! https://t.co/kYtT12FRCO

I’m proud to chair a committee that recognizes the importance of addressing #ClimateChange. @HouseScience is committed to listening to our nation’s best experts to ensure that we take #ClimateActionNow! https://t.co/lEMFwr8xuq

Today I joined some of my @OfficialCBC colleagues for the launch of the Emergency Taskforce on Black Youth Suicide and Mental Health. We cannot stay silent. We are speaking out and taking action for the children of our communities. https://t.co/B1hX5vRpV0

The president can say anything he wants but we know the truth: Unions are crucial to sustaining and growing a strong middle class. This is what @HouseDemocrats remain focused on as we keep pressing ahead with our #ForThePeople agenda!

This year's report makes clear that we have not succeeded in protecting our citizens from unhealthy ozone or other air pollutants. Now more than ever we must take swift action to reduce hazardous particles for the health of our communities neighbors and children. https://t.co/OL1FToNJqb

Join us this Saturday for a discussion on the role of women in promoting peace on the Korean Peninsula at my annual event A World of Women For World Peace. RSVP at RSVP.TX30@mail.house.gov https://t.co/10kmlyyrRT
https://t.co/ml7QFTlfJR

It is clear from even this redacted version of the #MuellerReport that the President of the United States and his campaign engaged in wrongdoing – involving both his campaign’s connections to Russian interference in the 2016 election and the obstruction of justice.
After listening to the AG’s press conference one thing is crystal clear: the full #MuellerReport must be made public.

You have been a wonderful addition to Congress @RepHaleyStevens with your passion for early childhood STEM education. We are delighted to have you on @HouseScience! The people of Michigan's 11th district made a great decision by choosing you to represent them in Washington! https://t.co/NdUl35f92m
Proudly displaying my #MFFL gear in the Capitol today. Thank you @swish41 for all the good memories you created in Dallas! #Dirk https://t.co/tUJoy6QVaP
Cases of measles are spiking across the nation and it’s entirely preventable.   When it comes to vaccinating children there is no healthy skepticism.   https://t.co/mAnbTkRbT7

I am so grateful to everyone who made this day happen. I’m honored that Eddie Bernice Johnson Union Station will be a place that connects people of all backgrounds and helps them along their way. https://t.co/es1sqgNBX2

Women shouldn’t need to work 15 months to be paid what men receive in 12. Minority women face even greater disparities.   It is time for #EqualPay. #EqualPayDay https://t.co/ZtECqtFbwD

Thanks @lupusresearch for your support! We have a lot of work to do to strengthen research and increase available resources. I am proud to lead the Lupus Caucus as we look to achieve progress. https://t.co/c5uybF4qG1

The Violence Against Women Act shouldn't have lapsed to begin with. As a cosponsor I'm working with the Judiciary and Financial Services Committees to make it stronger. When it comes up for a vote on the House Floor later this month I will proudly vote yes! #VAWA https://t.co/a9Ylw01XPC
My office is open to all Americans. Our military should be as well.  On #TransVisibilityWeek we reject the bigotry and discrimination represented by the #TransMilitaryBan! https://t.co/Khmb1GNQVf

It’s 2019 and a woman still makes on average 80 cents for every dollar earned by a man. Today we’re helping to end gender-based wage discrimination by passing the Paycheck Fairness Act. #EqualPayForEqualWork https://t.co/9y0JhZi0Bt

There are no two ways about it we must address climate change. #ClimateActionNow https://t.co/Cyp6VhirgY

Congress - and the American people - deserve to read the full report. Not the analysis of the man Pres. Trump hand-picked to oversee the conclusion of the Mueller investigation. #ReleaseTheFullReport

Hate has no place in our world. Bigotry has no place in our world. Terror has no place in our world. Islamophobia has no place in our world. My condolences to the victims of the #ChristChurch New Zealand shooting and to Muslims around the world.

Everyone deserves equal protection under the law. Everyone.  The #EqualityAct moves us closer to fulfilling our nation’s founding promise: all are created equal. I am proud to cosponsor this bill.  https://t.co/35ZGB7ogIH

The #TrumpBudget slashes funding for EPA and safe water. This is an outrage. I will stand up for safe water. That's why I am cosponsoring the #WATERAct to provide the support our communities need to have safe water for all. https://t.co/NESbLLRv3h
Yesterday I was delighted to spend a few minutes of my day with the Marching Band of Duncanville HS. Hope you all enjoyed your day at the Capitol! https://t.co/fYq8Wsdqh7

One word to describe this proposal from Pres. Trump: Irresponsible.   We were not sent to Washington to allow this president to drastically cut the health care of our seniors to pay for his wall. We won’t let it happen. https://t.co/5JAYWEjWml
Leaders. Trailblazers. Artists. Politicians. Caretakers.   Today and every day we recognize the women who have change the course of history!  #InternationalWomensDay https://t.co/UDL5EO8Rf4

Of all the people I’ve met and enjoyed serving with during my time in Washington Ralph Hall was a true friend. No matter what party he belonged to he believed in finding common ground in order to serve his constituents. That spirit of service is something I will dearly miss. https://t.co/X1p12tCDFQ

We need to invest in our research agencies that enhance America’s economic strength address our national priorities advance knowledge and inspire our youth. Thanks to @HouseBudgetDems for allowing me to testify on the importance of the work we are doing in @HouseScience. https://t.co/TgQWfMIJkW
